content.rendered:
Frank has a broad background in the marine industry, having sailed as an engineer on large passenger vessels, worked ashore as a superintendent and technical manager for commercial and superyacht fleets and spent several years as an IACS Class surveyor. He has particular expertise in Heavy Lift vessel operations and flo flo vessels.

Contact

Fort Lauderdale, FL | +1 954 599 1733

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Investigation of significant/contentious H&M Damages, Marine Steam Propulsion damages, groundings and salvage, Yacht Transportation damages
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert reports
